noun.description: A native or inhabitant of Algeria or Algiers, an Algerian; especially a pirate from Algiers. Now historical.

adjective.description: Of, belonging to, or relating to Algeria or Algiers; Algerian. Now historical.

origin: Mid 17th century. Partly (i) from † Alger, † Algier, † Arger, † Argier, variants of the name of Algiers + -ine;.
